Postac:AirborneExposure.NAME: Airborne Exposure
Postac:AirborneExposure.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Airborne. NL Airborne doesn't wear off this turn.

Postac:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
Postac:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage next turn. NL Add !Postac:SecondMagic! *Cuts to your hand.

Postac:Barrage.NAME: Barrage
Postac:Barrage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Enemy is Above: Retain 2 cards. NL Enemy is Below: Retain 1 card.

Postac:Bruised.NAME: Bruised
Postac:Bruised.DESCRIPTION: From now on, below effect activates, when enemy has 50% health or less.
Postac:Bruised.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL From now on, below effect activates, when enemy has 50% health or less.

Postac:Calm.NAME: Calm
Postac:Calm.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 *Strength after !M! turns. NL Gain !Postac:SecondMagic! Weak.

Postac:Carnage.NAME: Carnage
Postac:Carnage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Final Blow 4: NL I cost 1.

Postac:CatchABreath.NAME: Catch A Breath
Postac:CatchABreath.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL After 2 turns gain 1 Dexterity.

Postac:CircleStrike.NAME: Circle Strike
Postac:CircleStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Flanked: Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

Postac:ClashWithReality.NAME: Clash With Reality
Postac:ClashWithReality.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Airborne to enemy, deal !M! damage to him.

Postac:ComeBack.NAME: Come Back
Postac:ComeBack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, and put card from discard pile, to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Postac:ComeBack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage, and put card from discard pile, to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Postac:ConsumeTheWind.NAME: Consume The Wind
Postac:ConsumeTheWind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Final Blow 2: NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

Postac:CountOnYourself.NAME: Count On Yourself
Postac:CountOnYourself.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block for every Airborne stack you have.

Postac:CounterStrike.NAME: Counter Strike
Postac:CounterStrike.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Flanked: Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

Postac:CriticalStrike.NAME: Critical Strike
Postac:CriticalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Flanked: Deal double damage.

Postac:CutOpen.NAME: Cut Open
Postac:CutOpen.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy is Above: Gain !Postac:SecondMagic! Flow. NL Enemy is Below: Gain !M! Tempest.

Postac:DeadlyStrike.NAME: Deadly Strike
Postac:DeadlyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy is Above: Gain 2 Airborne. NL Enemy is Below: Upgrade !M! card in your hand for this combat.
Postac:DeadlyStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy is Above: Gain 2 Airborne. NL Enemy is Below: Upgrade !M! cards in your hand for this combat.

Postac:DeathIsLikeTheWind.NAME: Death Is Like The Wind
Postac:DeathIsLikeTheWind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add *Always *By *My *Side, to your hand.
Postac:DeathIsLikeTheWind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add upgraded *Always *By *My *Side, to your hand.

Postac:Delayed.NAME: Delayed
Postac:Delayed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 4 times. NL Final Blow 5: NL I cost 1 this turn.

Postac:Destruction.NAME: Destruction
Postac:Destruction.DESCRIPTION: For every *Cut exhausted, increase *Cut damage by 1.
Postac:Destruction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL For every *Cut exhausted, increase *Cut damage by 1.

Postac:DoubleProtection.NAME: Double Protection
Postac:DoubleProtection.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Flanked: Gain !B! block.

Postac:DoubleUp.NAME: Double Up
Postac:DoubleUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards next turn.

Postac:DrainTheAir.NAME: Drain The Air
Postac:DrainTheAir.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength at the end of the turn, for every Airborne you have.
Postac:DrainTheAir.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain 1 Strength at the end of the turn, for every Airborne you have.

Postac:End.NAME: End
Postac:End.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Enemy is Above: Gain !B! block. NL Enemy is Below: Deal damage equal to your block, then remove your block.

Postac:EyeOfTheCyclone.NAME: Eye Of The Cyclone
Postac:EyeOfTheCyclone.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block, whenever you gain Tempest.

Postac:FalterThem.NAME: Falter Them
Postac:FalterThem.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remove enemy's block. NL Flanked: Apply !M! Weak.

Postac:Fated.NAME: Fated
Postac:Fated.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you activate Flanked effect, lower cost of random card in your hand by 1.
Postac:Fated.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you activate Flanked effect, lower cost of random card in your hand by 1.

Postac:Finish.NAME: Finish
Postac:Finish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle 2 *Slimed into your draw pile. NL Final Blow 2: Don't shuffle *Slimed.

Postac:FirstCut.NAME: First Cut
Postac:FirstCut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add *Second *Cut to your hand.
Postac:FirstCut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add upgraded *Second *Cut to your hand.

Postac:Float.NAME: Float
Postac:Float.DESCRIPTION: Enemies no longer lose Airborne stacks on start of the turn.
Postac:Float.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Enemies no longer lose Airborne stacks on start of the turn.

Postac:FocusOnTheWind.NAME: Focus On The Wind
Postac:FocusOnTheWind.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 tempest, whenever you play strike.
Postac:FocusOnTheWind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 tempest, whenever you play strike or defend.

Postac:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
Postac:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: After playing !M! cards this turn, gain 1 Dexterity.
Postac:Fortify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: After playing !M! cards this turn, gain 1 Dexterity. NL Add !Postac:SecondMagic! *Cut to your hand.

Postac:FreshBreeze.NAME: Fresh Breeze
Postac:FreshBreeze.DESCRIPTION: Once a turn, when you play a creator card, gain 1 energy.
Postac:FreshBreeze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Once a turn, when you play a creator card, gain 1 energy.

Postac:GatheringStorm.NAME: Gathering Storm
Postac:GatheringStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 2 Airborne for every enemy hit.

Postac:GoodDrink.NAME: Good Drink
Postac:GoodDrink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Reduce cost of !M! cards in your hand by 1 this combat.

Postac:KillingSpree.NAME: Killing Spree
Postac:KillingSpree.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Final Blow 3: Heal half of damage dealt. NL Exhaust.

Postac:LastBreath.NAME: Last Breath
Postac:LastBreath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Final Blow 4: Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Postac:MakeItQuick.NAME: Make It Quick
Postac:MakeItQuick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard your hand. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Flanked: Set cost of drawn card to 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Postac:Marked.NAME: Marked
Postac:Marked.DESCRIPTION: Double damage taken by enemy next turn.

Postac:MinorBlade.NAME: Minor Blade
Postac:MinorBlade.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! weak. NL Add !Postac:SecondMagic! *Cuts to your hand

Postac:NextTurn.NAME: Next Turn
Postac:NextTurn.DESCRIPTION: Increase all powers, that will work for next turn by 1.

Postac:Overwhelm.NAME: Overwhelm
Postac:Overwhelm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Impatience. NL When Next Turn Damage, will deal excess damage, it deals redundant damage to random enemy.
Postac:Overwhelm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Impatience. NL When Next Turn Damage, will deal excess damage, it deals redundant damage to random enemy.

Postac:Patience.NAME: Patience
Postac:Patience.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Enemy is Above: Gain 2 Dexterity and Strength. NL Enemy is Below: Deal !D! Damage

Postac:PowerSurge.NAME: Power Surge
Postac:PowerSurge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Flanked: Gain !M! Strength, lose 1 Strength whenever you play Attack card. NL Exhaust.

Postac:PowerSpike.NAME: Power Spike
Postac:PowerSpike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage next turn. NL Gain !Postac:SecondMagic! Impatience in 2 turns.

Postac:Preparation.NAME: Preparation
Postac:Preparation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block next turn. NL Gain !M! Flow

Postac:QuickSlash.NAME: Quick Slash
Postac:QuickSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for every Tempest you have.

Postac:Recall.NAME: Recall
Postac:Recall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Flanked: Gain !M! Airborne.

Postac:Reflex.NAME: Reflex
Postac:Reflex.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy is Above: Draw 1 and reduce it's cost by 1. NL Enemy is Below: Draw !M! cards, you cannot draw more cards this turn.

Postac:RegainStrength.NAME: Regain Strength
Postac:RegainStrength.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Costs 1 less this turn, for every created card played this turn.

Postac:Reinforcements.NAME: Reinforcements
Postac:Reinforcements.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 energy next turn.

Postac:Renewal.NAME: Renewal
Postac:Renewal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy is Above: Gain 1 energy and draw 1 card. NL Enemy is Below: Gain 2 energy.

Postac:Repeat.NAME: Repeat
Postac:Repeat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Tempest. NL Flanked: Copy me, and shuffle hand.

Postac:Repurpose.NAME: Repurpose
Postac:Repurpose.DESCRIPTION: Set order of cards in your hand.
Postac:Repurpose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Set order of cards in your hand. NL Draw 1 card.

Postac:ResistMagic.NAME: Resist Magic
Postac:ResistMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Above: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Below: Dispel 1. NL Exhaust.
Postac:ResistMagic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Above: Gain !M! Artifacts. NL Below: Dispel 1. NL Exhaust.

Postac:Scrape.NAME: Scrape
Postac:Scrape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy is Above: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Enemy is Below: Apply !M! Weak.

Postac:SideBlock.NAME: Side Block
Postac:SideBlock.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Flanked: Apply !M! Weak to enemy.

Postac:Soften.NAME: Soften
Postac:Soften.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, NL Apply 1 Vulnerable and gain !M! Tempest.

Postac:SteelTempest.NAME: Steel Tempest
Postac:SteelTempest.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Critical Strike. NL Final Blow 2: I cost 0. NL Exhaust.
Postac:SteelTempest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Critical Strike. NL Final Blow 2: I cost 0.

Postac:SwiftAsTheWind.NAME: Swift As The Wind
Postac:SwiftAsTheWind.DESCRIPTION: Once a turn, when you create cards, create copy of last card created.
Postac:SwiftAsTheWind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Twice a turn, when you create cards, create copy of last card created.

Postac:TempestOnslaught.NAME: Tempest Onslaught
Postac:TempestOnslaught.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double your Tempest. NL Draw 1 card.

Postac:Thorns.NAME: Thorns
Postac:Thorns.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Add !M! *Cut to your hand.
Postac:Thorns.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Add !M! *Cuts to your hand.

Postac:ThrowAway.NAME: Throw Away
Postac:ThrowAway.DESCRIPTION: *Discard 2 cards. NL Add 3 *Cuts to your hand.
Postac:ThrowAway.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Discard 2 cards. NL Add 3 Upgraded *Cuts to your hand.

Postac:Unbreakable.NAME: Unbreakable
Postac:Unbreakable.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Gain half of block next turn.

Postac:WayOfTheWanderer.NAME: Way Of The Wanderer
Postac:WayOfTheWanderer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block next turn, if the enemy doesn't intend to attack. Otherwise gain half of the block.

Postac:WindFlurry.NAME: Wind Flurry
Postac:WindFlurry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block X times. NL Gain !M! Tempest X Times.
Postac:WindFlurry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block X+1 times. NL Gain !M! Tempest X+1 Times.

Postac:SecondCut.NAME: Second Cut
Postac:SecondCut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add *Third *Cut to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Postac:SecondCut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add upgraded *Third *Cut to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Postac:ThirdCut.NAME: Third Cut
Postac:ThirdCut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Airborne. NL Exhaust.

Postac:AlwaysByMySide.NAME: Always By My Side
Postac:AlwaysByMySide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block next turn. NL Exhaust.
